name: Macintosh Classic
description:
This is skeuomorphic illustration of the 1984 Macintosh 128K Classic, made completely in Figma. This is just a blend of gradients, drop shadows and inner shadows used in various combinations. I have used many photos of retro Macs as reference while making this.


Share and spread the love!

If you have any suggestions/inputs/ideas, please feel free to reach out to me.
